Entries.Good_9: Oh, I'm not bored... I'm just enjoying what we have here.#$e#It's a simple life, but I like it. Nice and gritty, like digging through the dirt to find worms and snails.$h
Entries.Neutral_8: No matter how much I clean, the house keeps getting dirty again.#$e#I guess farms can be kind of dirty. That's not such a bad thing.
Entries.Rainy_Day_0: It's raining outside, dear. Make sure you don't catch a cold like I always did!
Entries.Rainy_Day_3: What's on your agenda today, dear?#$e#I'd love to go outside in this weather, but I probably shouldn't... I'll just do some things around the house.#$e#Maybe I'll make something hot for dinner.
Entries.TwoKids_1: We have to make sure and give %kid1 a lot of attention now that we have %kid2. We don't want any jealousy between them. Trust me, I know how that goes.

Entries.danceRejection: Eheh... no thanks, I'd rather go solo. This flower queen can't get dragged down.
Entries.divorced: You know, everyone always said I was kind of stupid, but I'm smart enough to know not to give you the time of day.$a
Entries.dumped_Guys: ...Can't you see I'm busy reading?$a#$e#What? I'm not carrying a book? Oh, I guess you *can* pay attention.$a
Entries.secondChance_Guys: ...I guess we all have our airheaded moments. If you're sorry, then I'll let it go.$s
Entries.give_flowersA: Oh! Wait, you really want to do that?#$b#Uhh... jeez, that's kind of weird, but... we're pretty close, and we're both adults, so why not?$h
Entries.give_flowersB: Wow! Okay, I was *not* expecting *that*.#$b#We... I'm not really sure how to respond. I mean, I want to date you, but...$s#$b#Wait, hang on, why the heck can't I just date you? Let's do it!$h
Entries.give_pendant: ...!$u#$b#@, this... I'm speechless, I...#$b#You're sure? You're really, really sure? Then... I'd love to! I'll get everything set up as soon as I can!$l
Entries.refusal_knownA: Oh!#$b#Umm... I'm sorry, I don't think that's a good idea.$3
Entries.refusal_knownB: ...You're nice, farmer, but this is too much.$3
Entries.refusal_no_heartsB: We don't even know each other!$3
Entries.rejectNPCA: I'm... sorry, I'm just not interested.$s
Entries.rejectNPCB: ...Maybe we could get to know each other better?$s
Entries.reject_four_heartA: ...!$8#$b#Oh... my heart is pounding...$4#$b#...I'm... not ready. I'm sorry.$s
Entries.reject_four_heartB: Oh... I...$s#$b#I think we should just be friends.$s
Entries.reject_two_heartA: ...I think that's a bit too much too fast, don't you?$s
Entries.reject_two_heartB: Maybe we can get to know each other better...
Entries.stardrop_gift: Hey babe, I just wanted to say... I really love you.$4#$b#I thought that this stardrop would be a nice way to show my affection and gratitude.$1#$b#Thank you. For everything.$l

Changes.LogName: Vincent romance dialogue - dating or engaged

Entries.give_flowersA: Heh... jeez, you really know how to make a guy blush, don't you?$h
Entries.give_flowersB: ...They're so beautiful. You know what else is beautiful?$h#$b#A big bacon cheeseburger.#$b#Oh, you're pretty good too, heheh.$l
Entries.engageA: Heheh... babe, I already said yes!$h
Entries.engageB: Soon enough I'll have a whole collection of these things.$h
Entries.marriedA: Heheh... babe, I already said yes!$h
Entries.marriedB: Soon enough I'll have a whole collection of these things.$h
